de.mizi.magicsearch.output
Class MagicCardFragment

java.lang.Object
  android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      de.mizi.magicsearch.output.MagicCardFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
public class MagicCardFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment

This class represents a visible fragment that holds all informations of one single magiccard.
